description: This CSS file defines the styles and theme variables for a React web application, including light and dark themes, component styles, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styling for layout, background, and text color based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with layout and theme-based styling.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between themes, with defined styles for hover and active states.
